mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_id AS menuId, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_url AS menuUrl, m.parent_id AS parentId, m.menu_icon AS menuIcon, m.menu_order AS menuOrder FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission_menu pm ON pm.permission_id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON pm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND m.parent_id = 0 order by MENU_ORDER

SELECT m.menu_id AS menuId, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_url AS menuUrl, m.parent_id AS parentId, m.menu_icon AS menuIcon, m.menu_order AS menuOrder FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission_menu pm ON pm.permission_id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON pm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND m.parent_id = #{parentId} order by MENU_ORDER

SELECT sm.MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_URL, PARENT_ID, MENU_ICON, MENU_TYPE, MENU_ORDER, sm.CREATE_TIME, sm.CREATOR, sm.MODIFY_TIME, sm.MODIFIER FROM sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_group_menu sgm ON sgm.MENU_ID = sm.MENU_ID WHERE sgm.GROUP_ID = #{groupId} AND sm.MENU_ID = #{menuId} ORDER BY sm.MENU_ORDER
